Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship studies of ultra-short peptides with potent activities against fluconazole-resistant Candida albicans.
Literature.Author: Ng SMS, et al.

Literature.Title: Membranolytic Mechanism of Amphiphilic Antimicrobial β-Stranded [KL]n Peptides
Literature.Author: Schweigardt F, Strandberg E, Wadhwani P, Reichert J, Bürck J, Cravo HLP, Burger L, Ulrich AS

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:21% Hemolysis=256 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>256 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 64550 (MIC=3.13µM),Escherichia coli DSM 1116(MIC=64µg/ml),Franconibacter helveticus DSM 18390(MIC=16µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis DSM 347(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus xylosus DSM 20287(MIC=8µg/ml)
